TextBlock.Text: MELINA: Very well, this is the last anchor. We should attempt to triangulate them now.
CALAD: Is something the matter, Primm?
PRIMM: I realize there’s no nature here. Everything is constructed, but it also doesn’t feel lived in; like an attempt by someone to recreate our structures without understanding why we build them.
MELINA: It is so, in a way. But I expect it’ll feel lived in once we live here.
CALAD: I don’t think that will help, Melina. I agree with Primm’s feeling.
PRIMM: Is this project truly a good idea?
CALAD: I’m unsure, Primm. Regardless, let us exit this place; we’ll have enough time to think on the way.
